.v1beta1.Suggestion.description: Suggestion represents the structure of a Suggestion resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

.v1beta1.SuggestionCondition.description: SuggestionCondition describes the state of the Suggestion at a certain point.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: The last time this condition was updated.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

.v1beta1.SuggestionList.description: SuggestionList contains a list of Suggestion

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

.v1beta1.SuggestionSpec.description: SuggestionSpec defines the desired state of Suggestion

.v1beta1.SuggestionStatus.description: SuggestionStatus defines the observed state of Suggestion

algorithmSettings.description: Algorithmsettings set by the algorithm services.

completionTime.description: Represents time when the Suggestion was completed. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

conditions.description: List of observed runtime conditions for this Suggestion.

lastReconcileTime.description: Represents last time when the Suggestion was reconciled. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

startTime.description: Represents time when the Suggestion was acknowledged by the Suggestion controller. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

.v1beta1.Trial.description: Represents the structure of a Trial resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

.v1beta1.TrialAssignment.description: TrialAssignment is the assignment for one trial.

.v1beta1.TrialCondition.description: TrialCondition describes the state of the trial at a certain point.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: The last time this condition was updated.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

.v1beta1.TrialList.description: TrialList contains a list of Trials

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

metricsCollector.description: Describes how metrics will be collected

objective.description: Describes the objective of the experiment.

parameterAssignments.description: Key-value pairs for hyperparameters and assignment values.

retainRun.description: Whether to retain the trial run object after completed.

runSpec.description: Raw text for the trial run spec. This can be any generic Kubernetes runtime object. The trial operator should create the resource as written, and let the corresponding resource controller (e.g. tf-operator) handle the rest.

completionTime.description: Represents time when the Trial was completed. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC

conditions.description: List of observed runtime conditions for this Trial.

lastReconcileTime.description: Represents last time when the Trial was reconciled. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

observation.description: Results of the Trial - objectives and other metrics values.

startTime.description: Represents time when the Trial was acknowledged by the Trial controller. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC

algorithmSettings.description: Key-value pairs representing settings for suggestion algorithms.

customCollector.description: When kind is "customCollector", this field will be used

v1beta1.ConfigMapSource.description: ConfigMapSource references the config map where trial template is located

configMapName.description: Name of config map where trial template is located

configMapNamespace.description: Namespace of config map where trial template is located

templatePath.description: Path in config map where trial template is located

v1beta1.Experiment.description: Structure of the Experiment custom resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

v1beta1.ExperimentCondition.description: ExperimentCondition describes the state of the experiment at a certain point.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: The last time this condition was updated.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

v1beta1.ExperimentList.description: ExperimentList contains a list of Experiments

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

maxFailedTrialCount.description: Max failed trials to mark experiment as failed.

maxTrialCount.description: Max completed trials to mark experiment as succeeded

metricsCollectorSpec.description: Describes the specification of the metrics collector

objective.description: Describes the objective of the experiment.

parallelTrialCount.description: How many trials can be processed in parallel. Defaults to 3

resumePolicy.description: Describes resuming policy which usually take effect after experiment terminated.

trialTemplate.description: Template for each run of the trial.

completionTime.description: Represents time when the Experiment was completed. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

conditions.description: List of observed runtime conditions for this Experiment.

currentOptimalTrial.description: Current optimal trial parameters and observations.

failedTrialList.description: List of trial names which have already failed.

killedTrialList.description: List of trial names which have been killed.

lastReconcileTime.description: Represents last time when the Experiment was reconciled. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

pendingTrialList.description: List of trial names which are pending.

runningTrialList.description: List of trial names which are running.

startTime.description: Represents time when the Experiment was acknowledged by the Experiment controller. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

succeededTrialList.description: List of trial names which have already succeeded.

trials.description: Trials is the total number of trials owned by the experiment.

trialsKilled.description: How many trials have been killed.

trialsPending.description: How many trials are currently pending.

trialsRunning.description: How many trials are currently running.

metricsFormat.description: When the metrics output follows format as this field specified, metricsCollector collects it and reports to metrics server, it can be "<metric_name>: <float>" or else

v1beta1.GraphConfig.description: GraphConfig contains a config of DAG

v1beta1.NasConfig.description: NasConfig contains config for NAS job

additionalMetricNames.description: This can be empty if we only care about the objective metric. Note: If we adopt a push instead of pull mechanism, this can be omitted completely.

metricStrategies.description: This field is allowed to missing, experiment defaulter (webhook) will fill it.

metrics.description: Key-value pairs for metric names and values

v1beta1.Operation.description: Operation contains type of operation in DAG

v1beta1.OptimalTrial.description: OptimalTrial is the metrics and assignments of the best trial.

bestTrialName.description: BestTrialName is the name of the best trial.

parameterAssignments.description: Key-value pairs for hyperparameters and assignment values.

fileSystemPath.description: During training model, metrics may be persisted into local file in source code, such as tfEvent use case

filter.description: Default metric output format is {"metric": "<metric_name>", "value": <int_or_float>, "epoch": <int>, "step": <int>}, but if the output doesn't follow default format, please extend it here

httpGet.description: Model-train source code can expose metrics by http, such as HTTP endpoint in prometheus metric format

v1beta1.TrialParameterSpec.description: TrialParameterSpec describes parameters that must be replaced in trial template

name.description: Name of the parameter that must be replaced in trial template

reference.description: Reference to the parameter in search space

v1beta1.TrialSource.description: TrialSource represent the source for trial template Only one source can be specified

configMap.description: ConfigMap spec represents a reference to ConfigMap

trialSpec.description: TrialSpec represents trial template in unstructured format

v1beta1.TrialTemplate.description: TrialTemplate describes structure of trial template

configMap.description: ConfigMap spec represents a reference to ConfigMap

retain.description: Retain indicates that trial resources must be not cleanup

trialParameters.description: List of parameters that are used in trial template

trialSpec.description: TrialSpec represents trial template in unstructured format
